messages.message:
Yesterday, we did a schema/data migration for the job table. This creates new columns that make job table accesses faster and make filtering on attributes like flow pipelines, review states, reviewer doable/faster.

If you have an existing sandbox that you want to update to a commit more recent than yesterday, you need to run a dbupdate. Instruction for this coming soon.

Reader and Dataset Add Files (from ML Studio) jobs are currently broken. We are working on fixing it. This is also affecting dogfood stability. This is being tracked in <#C03D8JG5L0L|>
